name: Activity & Location Guides
description: Deep dives into specific activities or Welsh locations. What it is, who it's for, where to go, difficulty, best conditions.
use_for: Activity explainers (coasteering, hiking, MTB), location guides (48 Hours in Snowdonia, Pembrokeshire Beyond Beaches)

name: Gear Guides
description: What to bring, what to skip, budget vs premium options. Practical packing lists.
use_for: Wetsuit guides, waterproof jacket reviews, packing lists, budget gear, kids gear, photography gear

name: Safety Guides
description: Honest safety information. What can go wrong, how to prepare, when to bail.
use_for: Mountain safety, water safety, weather awareness, group management, solo safety, emergency contacts

name: Seasonal Content
description: What's on and what's best at different times of year. Honest about Welsh weather.
use_for: What's open in winter, school holiday planners, bank holiday ideas, festival season, dark skies

name: News & Updates
description: Platform news, new operators, route changes, event announcements.
use_for: New operators joining, route closures, event announcements, site updates

name: Trip Reports
description: First-person accounts of actual trips. Honest about what went right and wrong.
use_for: We tried Snowdonia Weekend, Family in Pembrokeshire, Solo in North Wales, Budget challenge, Rainy week

name: Operator Spotlights
description: Profiles of adventure operators. Their story, what makes them different, what they offer.
use_for: TYF Adventure profile, Zip World profile, small operator features, how to choose an operator
